title: Crashing or Disconnecting before game launches
body: Right after champ select, and before game launches, I don't even make it to the champion showcase screen before game launch. It just sends me back to the main LOL area with a button that says "reconnect", which does nothing when you press it. Is there a solution for this issue, has anyone else dealt with this? Any help would be greatly appreciated. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

replies.body: This sounds like a strange issue, especially if selecting Reconnect doesn't do anything.  Is this on the new client?  If so, I wonder if something with the update messed up some of your files or cannot locate files needed to render the game.  Let me know.
Yeah, right after the patch update of course. I've gone through a few different troubleshooting pages on LOL and haven't found the solution yet. *Sigh* wish me luck.
